title: Problem Patching League?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: This morning I was playing league just fine, now an hour later I try to get on and I get this message. When I click restart it says (https://gyazo.com/d0fbb9e19b03d88a65e47f7feb84d65c) and then fails to patch again. Anyone know what to do? Thanks!

replies.body: This patching issue was happening earlier today, but everything should be okay now!

Alot of people are having this issue. (there are other threads with more people confirming it). Some said to go to the installation folder and run lol.launcher.admin as an administrator and it fixed it for them. But for alot of us, it didn't. You can try though, maybe you are lucky. It seems to be an issue with riot. uninstalling/reinstalling does not seem to fix it. We will just have to wait on Rito to fix it. {{item:3070}}
This is my day off and I just wanted to sit down and listen to music while I played a bit of league. But I have the same problem.
Same here, hope it gets fixed ASAP. I don't wanna have to re-download
